I will go and do the things which the Lo: Adam fell that men might be; and men are, that they might have joy.
Wherefore, ye must press forward with a steadfastness in Christ.
When ye are in the service of your fellow beings ye are only in the service of your God.
Stand as witnesses of God at all times and in all things, and in all places.
By small and simple things are great things brought to pass.
O, remember, my son, and learn wisdom in thy youth.
It is upon the rock of our Redeemer, who is Christ, the Son of God, that ye must build your foundation.
My grace is sufficient for all men that humble themselves before me.
That which is of God inviteth and enticeth to do good continually.
Charity suffereth long, and is kind, and envieth not.
When ye shall read these things, ask God, the Eternal Father, in the name of Christ, if they are not true.
Men are free according to the flesh; and all things are given them which are expedient unto man.
Ye receive no witness until after the trial of your faith.
If the Lamb of God, he being holy, should have need to be baptized, how much more need have we, being unholy, to be baptized.
Have ye received his image in your countenances?
If ye do not watch yourselves, your thoughts, and your deeds, ye must perish.
Before ye seek for riches, seek ye for the kingdom of God.
My soul hungered; and I kneeled down before my Maker, and I cried unto him in mighty prayer and supplication.
